## PDB statistics
Import our PDB statistics CSV file and calculate percent strutures by experimental method.

```{r}
p <- read.csv("data Export Summary.csv", row.names=1)
```

```{r}
percent <- (p$Total / sum(p$Total)) * 100
names(percent) <- row.names(p)
percent
```
